A zip-fastening allows for quick and easy changing.

breadcrumb: Home, Home & Furniture, Bedding, Duvets
description: Stay cool and fresh while you sleep under this soft and lightweight duvet. Our specially designed Hydrocool®  technology wicks moisture away from your body, helping to regulate your body temperature, whilst the 4.5 tog rating makes it perfect for those warmer nights. The antibacterial filling helps prevent the growth of dust mites, fungus and bacteria which can trigger allergies. It also reduces odours, making for a better nights sleep all around.

breadcrumb: Home, Home & Furniture, Bedding, Duvets
description: Part of our Supremely Washable range, this duvet has a quick-dry filling that means it can be washed, dried and back on your bed in a day. Though it has an 18 tog rating, it is suitable for all seasons. Use the popper fastenings to detach the summer-weight 4.5 tog duvet from the cosy 13.5 tog duvet when the warm weather arrives. When it gets cooler, simply fasten the two duvets back together. It's like having three duvets in one.
product_name: Supremely Washable 18 Tog All Seasons 3-in-1 Duvet

breadcrumb: Home, Home & Furniture, Bedding, Duvets
description: This pure cotton Ultimate Comfort duvet is silky soft and is filled with special fibres to ensure a forever full feeling and give you the ultimate night's rest. Thanks to its 10.5 tog, this duvet will keep you warm all year round. This duvet also has two buttons at the top which can be attached to our Ultimate Comfort bedding set to prevent the duvet slipping around during the night. The cover is crafted from 230 thread count cotton for a breathable feel.

breadcrumb: Home, Home & Furniture, Bedding, Duvets
description: Indulge in the ultimate bedding upgrade with this exceptionally soft duvet, crafted for both luxury and versatility. Filled with premium Hungarian goose down, it offers a plush, naturally breathable warmth that adapts to the seasons. Use the lighter 4.5 tog or the cosier 9 tog duvet individually, or fasten them together for a snug 13.5 tog option - it's like having three duvets in one. Encased in a 300 thread count pure cotton cover that’s down-proof and beautifully breathable, its gusseted construction ensures even distribution and a graceful drape across your bed.
product_name: Luxury Hungarian Goose Down 13.5 Tog All Seasons 3-in-1 Duvet
size: King Size (5 ft), Super King Size (6 ft), satisfaction, quality, price, weight, purchase, comfort, flexibility, material, sheen, size

breadcrumb: Home, Home & Furniture, Bedding, Duvets
description: For those after year-round comfort, our all season two-part duvet makes a perfect choice. Incredibly breathable and insulating, our duck feather and down filling provide a luxurious touch, while a pure cotton 233 thread count, down proof cover gives the duvet a super soft feel. Made up of a 4.5 tog and a 9 tog to adapt to the temperature, our duvet can easily be tied together to create a 13.5 tog duvet that’s designed to keep you all snug and warm throughout the cold winter months. It's like having three duvets in one. Our duvet is  also machine washable making it super easy to clean.
product_name: Duck Feather & Down 13.5 Tog All Seasons 3-in-1 Duvet

breadcrumb: Home, Home & Furniture, Bedding, Duvets
description: Indulge in the luxurious feel of hotel-style bedding every night with our Ultimate Comfort duvet. Designed with a versatile 7.5 tog rating, it delivers just the right amount of warmth for use throughout the year. Crafted from soft, naturally breathable 230 thread count cotton, the cover ensures a cool, fresh feel while the advanced forever full fibre filling keeps the duvet plump and cloud-like night after night. Two discreet buttons at the top allow you to fasten it securely to our Ultimate Comfort bedding set, so it stays perfectly in place. Made in Great Britain.
